page.title: 20THE AUTHORS
page.content: The research for this survey was carried out by the pupils of{Rosliston {C.E.Primary School,South Derbyshire, which is a small rural school of 70 pupils. The children involved were from{Class {Two}and ranged between 7 and 9 years of age.As the children were so young, most of the text was prepared by their teacher,{Mrs.A.M.Pope.} We should like to thank the people who helped us,especially Mrs.Walley, Mrs.Goodall and Mrs.Griffiths for providing both transport and information. We are also grateful to{Mr.Tweats } for answering his son{David's questions about a day in his busy life.
